name: FTP Brute Force Logins With Default Credentials Reporting

description.summary: It was possible to login into the remote FTP server using weak/known credentials.
description.impact: Remote attacker may gain access to sensitive information or modify system configuration.

solution.text: Change the password as soon as possible.

description.detection_method: Detected weak credentials via VT 'FTP Brute Force Logins With Default Credentials'.

description.summary: Reporting of files containing the output of the phpinfo() PHP function previously detected via HTTP.
description.impact: Potential disclosure of sensitive information such as usernames, IP addresses, server version, and configuration.

solution.text: Delete the listed files or restrict access to them.

description.insight: PHP tutorials often leave phpinfo.php accessible on servers. This can leak sensitive environment data.
